LEGO Bub and Bob

by Chris Smith
, 9 September 2014

I like Lego. I like retro video games. Both contain things made of blocks. That gives me an idea.

Here are two of my favourite bubble blowing dragons, Bub and Bob, from the 1987 game Bubble Bobble recreated in Lego with help from my 8 year old son, Oliver.

About me

I'm Chris Smith, a senior front-end developer and team lead from the UK. I've been making web pages easy to use, fast and accessible since 1999.

I don't use any AI tools in my content, it's all me, for better or worse.

You can reach me on CodePen, Mastodon and X (Twitter).
